description: Students consider a selected figure or movement from the history of philosophy. May be repeated if topics are different. Prerequisites: two courses in philosophy, one of which must be either 235 or 236, or permission of the department chair.
name: Sem:Studies in Hist: Hume
prerequisites: Prerequisites: two courses in philosophy, one of which must be either 235 or 236, or permission of the department chair.
title: Seminar in the History of Philosophy
